about_the_game:
The Butterfly Witch Riblo is an alchemist living in Pipiforest.
Riblo suddenly ends up standing alone with her as her master, who was with her, leaves.
She's a young witch who barely ever went outside Pipiforest, knowing the world...
Will she be able to successfully complete the homework given by her Master, "Making the Sage Stone""

【Collection of various materials】
Explore various areas, collect materials, and try new alchemy!

【Collection of alchemy recipes】
Collect alchemy recipes and complete the recipe book!

【Resolution of residents' requests】
On the bulletin board, there are notes from residents who need help.
Help them and earn rewards!

(After the game's official version is released, localization in English and Japanese will be completed at the end of 2021.)

name: Alchemist of Pipi Forest Demo
short_description: Alchemist of Pipiforst is a fantasy RPG game where you collect items and perform alchemy. Explore new areas, collect mysterious materials, and solve various quests. A variety of exciting episodes await you.
